configurable.i18n_description: The Gwenevere Arabian Spice brings together A very expensive brand’s original skinny fit jean for women with its coloured stretch denim, inspired by fashion’s new naturals palette. The Gwenevere skinny has a low rise and fits slim through the hips and legs with a perfect length right below the ankle. The effect is a clean look that is so comfortable, you’ll want to live in these jeans the weekend long. 7FAM’s rich brown Arabian Spice wash is characterised by its red cast and contrast whiskers. We think it’s the perfect balance of the bold and brave with grown-up originality.
configurable.i18n_description_de:
• Die Gwenevere Arabian Spice vereint A very expensive brands original Skinny Fit Jeans für Damen mit seinem farbigen Stretch-Denim
  • inspiriert von den Naturfarben der neuen Saison
  • die Gwenevere Skinny hat eine niedrige Leibhöhe und verläuft schmal an Hüfte und Beinen
  • perfekte Länge bis kurz über den Knöchel
  • das Ergebnis: ein cleaner Look
  • himmlischer Tragekomfort: Diese Jeans möchten Sie das ganze Wochenende gar nicht mehr ausziehen
  • 7FAMs tiefbrauner Arabian Spice Wash zeichnet sich durch den Rotstich und die andersfarbigen Sitzfalten aus
  • wir finden: die perfekte Mischung aus Selbstbewusstsein und erwachsener Originalität
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De Gwenevere Arabian Spice combineert de originele skinny vrouwenjeans van A very expensive brand met de gekleurde stretchdenim, geïnspireerd op het palet trendy natuurlijke kleuren. De Gwenevere skinny heeft een lage heuplijn en slanke pasvorm rondom de heupen en benen met een perfecte lengte tot net onder de enkel. Het effect is een strakke look die zo comfortabel is dat je het hele weekend in deze jeans wilt rondlopen. De warmbruine Arabian Spice-wassing van 7FAM heeft een typisch rode schakering en contrasterende strepen. Deze jeans is de perfecte balans tussen gewaagd stoer en volwassen origineel.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Le Gwenevere version Arabian Spice revisite le skinny original de A very expensive brand pour femme en le déclinant dans un denim stretch coloré, inspiré de la nouvelle palette de couleurs naturelles très tendance cette saison. Le Gwenevere skinny se distingue par sa coupe taille basse, slim au niveau des hanches et des jambes avec une longueur parfaite juste sous la cheville. Ce jean au look clean est si confortable que vous ne le quitterez plus du week-end. 7FAM a élaboré ce lavage Arabian Spice d’un marron intense, égayé de nuances de rouge et de whiskers en contraste. Voici un modèle audacieux qui respire l’originalité.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Gwenevere Arabian Spice abbina gli originali skinny da donna di A very expensive brand a un denim stretch colorato, ispirato a una nuova palette di colori naturali e fashion. Lo skinny Gwenevere a vita bassa, aderente attorno a fianchi e gambe, arriva appena sotto la caviglia, per una lunghezza davvero perfetta. Risultato? Un look dalle linee pulite e una vestibilità talmente confortevole che li vorrete indossare per tutto il week-end, senza toglierli mai. Il lavaggio marrone intenso Arabian Spice, proposto dalla griffe, si distingue per le sfumature rosse e i baffi a contrasto. Un equilibrio perfetto tra audacia, coraggio e originalità.
configurable.i18n_description_es: The Gwenevere Arabian Spice brings together A very expensive brand’s original skinny fit jean for women with its coloured stretch denim, inspired by fashion’s new naturals palette. The Gwenevere skinny has a low rise and fits slim through the hips and legs with a perfect length right below the ankle. The effect is a clean look that is so comfortable, you’ll want to live in these jeans the weekend long. 7FAM’s rich brown Arabian Spice wash is characterised by its red cast and contrast whiskers. We think it’s the perfect balance of the bold and brave with grown-up originality.

configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit: The Gwenevere is our original skinny fit. With a comfortably low rise, it's slim through the hips and leg and hits at the ankle to maintain a clean line with no stacking. It is available with clean back pockets or the A very expensive brand signature squiggle.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_de:
• Die Gwenevere ist unsere original Röhrenjeans
  • mit komfortablem niedrigem Bund
  • um die Hüften und Beine schmal geschnitten
  • knöchellang für einen cleanen Look mit schmaler Silhouette
  • erhältlich mit schlichten Gesäßtaschen oder A very expensive brands „Squiggle“-Logo
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_nl: De Gwenevere is onze originele skinny model. Met een comfortabele lage heuplijn is deze jeans smal bij de heupen en benen. Hij valt mooi op de enkel voor een pure lijn zonder kreukels. Dit model is beschikbaar met sobere achterzakken of met de karakteristieke squiggle van A very expensive brand.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_fr: Le Gwenevere est notre jean skinny original. Doté d’une taille basse confortable, il est slim sur les hanches et les jambes, et ce jusqu’à la cheville, pour une ligne impeccable et sans plis. Il est disponible au choix avec des poches arrière clean ou bien ornées du fameux logo brodé de A very expensive brand.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_it: Gwenevere è l’originale skinny di 7FAM. Questo modello a vita bassa e confortevole arriva alla caviglia per un taglio deciso senza arricciature e ha una vestibilità slim attorno ai fianchi e alla gamba. È disponibile con tasche posteriori dalle linee pulite o con il logo ricamato di A very expensive brand.
configurable.i18n_product_moreaboutthefit_es: The Gwenevere is our original skinny fit. With a comfortably low rise, it's slim through the hips and leg and hits at the ankle to maintain a clean line with no stacking. It is available with clean back pockets or the A very expensive brand signature squiggle.
